title: HYDERABAD POLO AND RIDING CLUB - Intermediate Riding Programme
text: HYDERABAD POLO AND RIDING CLUB - Intermediate Riding Programme +91 – 9177 00 00 56 info@hprc.co.in Member Login Pay Now toggle navigation Home About us Who We Are Mission Vision Values Managing Committee Start Riding About Riding Packages Beginners Riding Programme Intermediate Riding Programme Advanced Riding Programme Polo Equestrian Polo About Polo Stick & Ball Chukkers Events Past Events Upcoming Events SPORTS CENTRE Tennis Badminton Squash Swimming pool Basketball Futsal Gym Sauna Upcoming SportS Event Packages Gold Package Platinum Package RESTAURANTS Chukkers Snaffles Bistro BANQUETS Membership Events & Media Photo Gallery Video Gallery News Events Newsletters Blogs Contact Us Intermediate Riding Programme Packages Intermediate Riding Programme Intermediate Riding Programme Our Intermediate Riding Programme bridges the gap between beginner and advanced riding, perfect for those who have mastered the basics and are ready to tackle more complex techniques. This package includes progressive lessons with experienced instructors, emphasizing improved control, balance, and riding skills. Riders will gain confidence and competence, preparing them for advanced challenges and specialized disciplines. Join us to continue your equestrian journey and build upon your foundational skills in a supportive and dynamic environment. Timings: 6.00am to 10.00am & 4.00pm to 9.00pm Charges: Intermediate Level Riding Course Particulars Price GST Total 24 Riding Coupon Rs. 6000 Rs. 1080 Rs. 7080 Coaching Rs. 4,000 Rs. 720 Rs. 4720 Explore Home About Us Membership Login Start Riding Polo News & Events Contact Us Quick links Apply for Membership Pay Now e-Brochure Past Events Facilities Sport Center Restaurants Banquets Address Near Mrugavani Resort and Spa, Aziz Nagar Village, Gandipet, Ranga Reddy District, Hyderabad, Telangana, India - 500075 reaz@hprc.co.in +91 9177000056 View Location On Map Gallery © 2005 – 2024.
